problem_text: Circle O has a radius of 13 inches. Radius O B is perpendicular to chord C D which is 24 inches long. Find O X.
compact_text: Circle O has a radius of 13 inches. Radius OB is perpendicular to chord CD which is 24 inches long. Find OX.
annotat_text:
Circle $O$ has a radius of 13 inches. Radius $\overline{O B}$ is perpendicular to chord $\overline{C D}$ which is 24 inches long.
Find OX
